name: Semester Two: A Rival in D League
name_original: Semester Two: A Rival in D League
description:
This game is  a sequel to one that I made last year to test how far I could get in making a game in a week.  This game was also made in a week as a point of comparison.

This game continues to follow Mary, a university freshman learning to play hockey in her second semester. The game play has been adjusted for this game. Instead of simply choosing what Mary practices, you can also make choices that affect the hockey games she plays.
